Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting Details I'm not to good with compass directions or longitude and latitude but I will try my best. My daughter and I were on our way to pick up my 9 year old son from school. It was approximately 2:05pm we were on the 15fwy headed west from Temecula to Murrieta and merging right onto the 215fwy to go north, when a bright shiny light in the sky caught my attention. I looked up and saw 4 or 5 bright metallic shiny lights out in the distance above the hills of what seemed to be the Lake Elsinore area. I screamed at my daughter, " Oh my god, what is that?" she looked up and as she did the lights seemed to have moved slightly and now looked to be 7 or 8 lights that were in some sort of formation or could possibly be part of a single disc shaped object. Within seconds it went behind the hills and disappeared. The sighting lasted about 20 seconds. As I drove I tried to watch for it again but it never reappeared. We spent the rest of the day trying to figure out what it might have been. I've never seen a plane just sit in the sky and not move. Nor have I ever seen a plane or anything else for that matter change shapes or formation like that. I was very excited and my heart was racing. It gave us something to ponder for a while.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Lake Elsinore
There were no other sightings in Lake Elsinore on or around January 17th 2008
Summary: 4 or 5 metallic bright shiny ball shaped objects in the sky above the hills that changed positions then appeared to be at least 7 lights in a circular shape.
